statements: DELETE FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_id = 100 AND claim_amount > 5000.0
DELETE FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 100 AND claim_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM external_databases WHERE database_id IN (SELECT database_id FROM external_databases WHERE database_name = 'Test Database') AND database_url LIKE '%example.com%';
DELETE FROM CrossReference WHERE claim_id = 100 AND db_id = 200;
DELETE FROM Claims WHERE customer_id = 5000 AND is_fraud = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE claim_id = 100 AND database_id = 3;
